Text: Pit Warehouse
A top-access storage site that fits in remote corners.
"Let’s hope things at the bottom don’t rot."
Pit Pile
A top-access storage site that fits in remote corners.

"I could easily hide a body in there."  
-Jack the Gnawer
Small Covered Tank
A smaller storage tank, but one that can be expanded upon.
Long Tiny Warehouse
A slightly longer warehouse to fill in hard-to-reach corners.

"I wonder what strange shapes the storage committee will come up with next."  
-A lumberjack beaver
Medium Pile
Properly alternating log orientation is important.
Long Tiny Pile
An elongated small pile to use in hard-to-reach corners.
To be honest, I was expecting a squiggly storage.
Pit Tank
Don't lose the bucket, humans waged wars for such things.
Not the best way to store water, but at least it will stay clean.
Gigargantuan Storage Pile
Gigargantuan Warehouse

Stores a ludicrous amount of one type of resource. Requires ladders for access The central 7x1 lines do not require support underneath. The glass panes on top are graciously provided by the WhitePaws as part of a self-promotion campaign.
Hopefully that's not radioactive glass...
Stores a ludicrous amount of one type of resource. The central 7x1 lines do not require support underneath.
Did you think someone would give you all that glass for free? Who would ever do that?
